description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. 8BitsRetroZSurvivals is an addictive retro 3D styled game where you have to survive against the attacks of zombies. Try to survive on 3 unique maps - Headquarters, Sewers and Village
description.short: 8BitsRetroZSurvivals is an addictive retro 3D styled game where you have to survive against the attacks of zombies. Try to survive on 3 unique maps - Headquarters, Sewers and Village
